Author: teaaaelliott
Text: that sounds really hard I’m sorry you’re going through that :/  I know that’s probably what’s best to do but it feels so hard for me to be confrontational about the situation, yknow?

Author: omgitscynthia
Text: On the opposite end of the spectrum, all my friends and my husband make recovery hard for me. I have BED and definitely feel encouraged/pressured to eat when others around me are eating regardless of how hungry I am or how recently I just ate.   You might just have to be blunt with her and tell her you can't be her sounding board for things like that right now.
